Action.author: binhn
Action.body: Any guess on workload? #1 would be easiest as we already have a function to do that for local MSP, but others would require more work, especially we need code to decide whether to deliver events or not based on which channel the listeners can access.

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: Right (1) would be easier, and in the end i am not sure (2) would buy us a lot. That is, it is not clear to me whether it would be feasible to have clients from Org1, and peers from Org2, and clients to have joined all the channels peers have joined.
